thread.title: Danny Glover joins 'A Meyers Christmas' cast
thread.title_full: Danny Glover joins 'A Meyers Christmas' cast - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Danny Glover joins 'A Meyers Christmas' cast
text:
Veteran actor Danny Glover is set to star in Universal Studios "A Meyers Christmas".
READ: Alec Baldwin, Danny Glover set to join upcoming movie 'Andron'
Previously titled, A Meyers Thanksgiving , the film revolves around a family who are brought together over Christmas for the first time, after turning away following the demise of their mother, said The Hollywood Reporter.
Baggage Claim writer-director David E Talbert will helm the project and Gabrielle Union will serve as executive producer.
Will Packer will produce under his Universal-based Will Packer Productions
